schema.name: reqTypeBillOnly
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are bill only and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly and reqTypeJustInTime are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

schema.name: reqTypeConsignment
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are consignment and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeConsignment=true and reqTypeBillOnly=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeConsignment and reqTypeBillOnly are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeConsignment=true and reqTypeBillOnly=false.

schema.name: reqTypeInvReplenishment
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are inventory replenishment and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeInvReplenishment=true and reqTypeJustInTime=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeInvReplenishment and reqTypeJustInTime are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeInvReplenishment=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

schema.name: reqTypeJustInTime
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are just in time and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeJustInTime=true and reqTypeConsignment=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeJustInTime and reqTypeConsignment are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeJustInTime=true and reqTypeConsignment=false.

schema.name: reqTypeParReplenishment
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are par replenishment and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, , reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeParReplenishment=true and reqTypeConsignment=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeParReplenishment and reqTypeConsignment are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeParReplenishment=true and reqTypeConsignment=false.

schema.name: reqTypeShowAllTypes
schema.description: If true, retrieves all requisition types. If false, the requisitionType parameter will be used to filter results.

schema.name: reqTypeSupplierContract
schema.description: If true, retrieves requisition types that are Supplier Contract Request and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract.

schema.description: The Workday ID of the requisition.

schema.description: The requisition date using the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: requisitionType
schema.description:
The Workday ID of the requisition type. If populated, retrieve all requisition types that exactly match the combination of usages of the requisition type passed (e.g. Inventory Replenishment and Bill Only). 

If not populated, the default is the combination of reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, and reqTypeConsignment.

Ignored if reqTypeShowAllTypes is populated.

The Workday ID of the requisition type. If populated, retrieve all requisition types that exactly match the combination of usages of the requisition type passed (e.g. Inventory Replenishment and Bill Only). 

If not populated, the default is the combination of reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, and reqTypeConsignment.

Ignored if reqTypeShowAllTypes is populated.

schema.name: reqTypeBillOnly
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are bill only and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly and reqTypeJustInTime are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

name: Procurement-Requisitions-GET-getRequisitions
description: [Procurement] GET /requisitions — Retrieves a collection of requisitions.

schema.name: externalSourceableId
schema.description: query parameter: externalSourceableId

schema.name: externalSystemId
schema.description: query parameter: externalSystemId

schema.name: fromDate
schema.description: Filters the requisitions with document date on or after the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: requester
schema.description: Filters the requisitions by requester. Specify the Workday ID of the worker who requested the requisition.

schema.name: requisitionType
schema.description: Filters the requisitions by type. Specify the Workday ID of the requisition type. You can specify multiple requisitionType query parameters.

schema.name: submittedBy
schema.description: Filters the requisitions by the Worker who submitted the requisition. Specify the Workday ID or the reference ID of the worker. You can use a returned id from GET /workers in the Staffing REST web service.

schema.name: submittedByPerson
schema.description: Filters the requisitions by the Person who submitted the requisition. Specify the Workday ID or the reference ID of the person.

schema.name: submittedBySupplier
schema.description: Filters the requisitions by the supplier who submitted the requisition. Specify the Workday ID or the reference ID of the supplier. You can specify multiple submittedBySupplier query parameters.

schema.name: toDate
schema.description: Filters the requisitions with document date on or before the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

name: Procurement-Requisitions-POST-postRequisitions
description: [Procurement] POST /requisitions — Creates a requisition.

schema.name: requestBody
schema.description: JSON request body.

schema.name: reqTypeBillOnly
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are bill only and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly and reqTypeJustInTime are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

schema.name: reqTypeConsignment
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are consignment and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeConsignment=true and reqTypeBillOnly=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeConsignment and reqTypeBillOnly are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeConsignment=true and reqTypeBillOnly=false.

It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeInvReplenishment=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

schema.name: reqTypeJustInTime

schema.description:
The Workday ID of the requisition type. If populated, retrieve all requisition types that exactly match the combination of usages of the requisition type passed (e.g. Inventory Replenishment and Bill Only). 

If not populated, the default is the combination of reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, and reqTypeConsignment.

Ignored if reqTypeShowAllTypes is populated.

If true, retrieves requisition types that are bill only and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly and reqTypeJustInTime are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

name: Procurement-PurchaseOrders-GET-getPurchaseOrders_1
description: [Procurement] GET /purchaseOrders — Retrieves a collection of purchase orders.

schema.name: buyer
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders by buyer. Specify the Workday ID of the worker assigned as buyer on the purchase order. You can specify multiple buyer query parameters.

schema.name: company
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders by company. Specify the Workday ID of the company. You can specify multiple company query parameters.

schema.name: excludeCanceled
schema.description: If true, this method excludes the purchase orders with Canceled status. The default is false.

schema.name: excludeClosed
schema.description: If true, this method excludes the purchase orders with Closed status. The default is false.

schema.name: fromDate
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders with document date on or after the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: orderFromConnection
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders by supplier order-from connections. Specify the Workday ID of the order-from connection. You can specify multiple order-from connection query parameters.

schema.name: status
schema.description:
Filters the purchase orders by status. Specify the Workday ID of the status. You can specify multiple status query parameters.

Valid values:

* 8a54a80900cb4114b62f82ed86e495f7 - Pending Issue

* dc76c312446c11de98360015c5e6daf6 - Issued 

* dc76c8bc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6 - In Progress

* dc76c4fc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6 - Draft

* dc76c7cc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6 - Denied

* 24f0f71de78540cbb1445ba9e5e94d17 - Closed

* bd5a732c160c4e84b350ba4d6f7c10c5 - Change Order In Progress

* dc76c9b6446c11de98360015c5e6daf6 - Canceled

* 91b0d382d50848e898733757caa9f84a - Approved

schema.name: submittedBy
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders by the worker who submitted the purchase order. Specify the Workday ID of the worker. You can specify multiple submittedBy query parameters. You can use a returned id from GET /workers in the Staffing REST web service.

schema.name: supplier
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders by supplier. Specify the Workday ID of the supplier. You can specify multiple supplier query parameters.

schema.name: toDate
schema.description: Filters the purchase orders with document date on or before the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

The Workday ID of the requisition type. If populated, retrieve all requisition types that exactly match the combination of usages of the requisition type passed (e.g. Inventory Replenishment and Bill Only). 

If not populated, the default is the combination of reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, and reqTypeConsignment.

Ignored if reqTypeShowAllTypes is populated.

schema.name: reqTypeBillOnly
schema.description:
If true, retrieves requisition types that are bill only and whose other reqType parameters (except reqTypeShowAllTypes) are also true. The reqType parameters are: reqTypeBillOnly, reqTypeInvReplenishment, reqTypeJustInTime, reqTypeParReplenishment, reqTypeConsignment, reqTypeSupplierContract. 

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly and reqTypeJustInTime are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeBillOnly=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

schema.name: reqTypeConsignment
schema.description:

Example: If you specify the query parameters reqTypeConsignment=true and reqTypeBillOnly=true, this endpoint retrieves the requisition types whose reqTypeConsignment and reqTypeBillOnly are both true. It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeConsignment=true and reqTypeBillOnly=false.

It won't retrieve requisition types whose reqTypeInvReplenishment=true and reqTypeJustInTime=false.

schema.name: reqTypeJustInTime
